title: Cultured Homeless Man, The Golden Us, Jim Gaffigan, & Doug Smith
description:
Jim Gaffigan talks with the guys about his new movie, being a top comedian, and why he became a clean comedian. Comedian Doug Smith joins us to talk about living in NYC, his long time job as a dog walker, and tells a very captivating story about the time he was a hero.

Feits has a rivalry brewing with a homeless man and something has made him rather uncomfortable. Prince Harry and Meghan Markle quit the Royal Family. Feits comes up with some new slang, totally on purpose. Voicemails include: Clout for Cash, Shared Location, and Fast Food at Home.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
